song.englishname: A Toast To My Former Self

english.segment1: With all those thoughts I've left behind. I'm putting to death, no remorse what's pushed inside. With a toast I sigh. I'm sealing the fate of this weight, what's left has died. Goddbye to this child. Taking a piece of a promise that's left for mine. You'll see my eyes start to dry. My loose ends are tied..I see the day bring light
english.segment2: Kill the day and fill me, break my past renew me. Lift up my head, I'm weary. Strip my thoughts and I'll..
english.segment3: Kill this day, now fill me
english.segment4: Bleed out my wounds, Bleed out my wounds. And break free to shed cocoons. My second taste of you is the end. All I need to breathe anew
english.segment5: All those ways to choke my neck. I'm turning my back on those hopeless, failed attempts. I see my breath bringing a place that's so long been past as left. But now I know what's next. I'm sealing the fate of my selfish existence. Pushing on with life from death, no questions left. I'm giving my life, no less
